name: Chaikus Exercise Template
description:
A Haiku mixer exercise template that uses main and child components to create "changed" mix ups of normal haikus up to 20 participants write.


We used this template to workshop theories of change in the form of haiku, and now you can too!


Instructions in the first page. Press play on the Chaiku Mixer page to view the final mixer interface. Click a dot for a chaiku, click someone's name to see their original haiku.
